import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; // Add Framer Motion for scroll animations const AboutPage = () => { return (
{/* Key Features Section */}

Our Key Features

At DStar, we focus on creating a nurturing and secure environment for your child. We implement features aimed at their comfort and well-being:

  • 🚍 Pickup services from local Primary Schools and school bus drop-off points
  • 🧼 A clean, safe environment with constant oversight
  • 🎓 Homework guidance and supervision by experienced tutors
  • 🛡️ 24-hour CCTV surveillance for enhanced security
  • 🚿 Shower facilities for personal care
  • 📺 Engaging educational TV programs
  • ❄️ Air-conditioned classrooms for a comfortable learning atmosphere
  • ⏰ Customised timetables tailored to individual schedules
  • 🍎 Balanced meals and snacks prepared daily
  • 📚 Well-stocked library and recreational activities for holistic growth
  • 📲 Frequent updates on your child's progress and activities
  • ✨ Exciting holiday programs with field trips and enrichment activities
{/* Philosophy Section */}

Our Philosophy

At DStar, we emphasize character development by fostering a love for learning. We believe in the importance of learning, playing, and growing together to build a solid foundation for the future.

{/* Company Profile Section */}

About Our Company

DStar Pte Ltd is a subsidiary company of Smart Edu Group. Smart Edu Group has many years of experience in the education Industry especially in Executive training, and early childhood education. The group comprises of childcare centres and student care both locally and in the Asia. The group is managed by high professional sound academic background (Degree, Master Degree and Doctorate). The team is committed to continuing develop new learning programs and curriculum to benefit all our SMART group’s kids.

{/* Mission Section */}

Our Commitment

We foster character growth and a love for education by providing an enriching learning environment, offering children the building blocks they need for lifelong success.

{/* Vision Section */}

Our Aspiration

We aim to be recognized internationally for our excellence in education, creating a positive and safe learning environment that supports lifelong learning.

); }; export default AboutPage;
